name: Haunted Dungeons
description:
A turn based dungeon crawler in which you have to fight your way through these haunted dungeons to find the golden goblet.

Find new weapons and and armour in chests to help you achieve this.

You also have an ability to rewind the state of your, health, equipment and inventory, but use this power wisely. Whilst you may get your health back, you might also lose that shiny new weapon you picked up a few turns back.

The Team

Jeremy - Development

Chris - Development + Game Design
